entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
